variable.name: CCNAME
variable.comment: A short name describing the case control type.

variable.name: CASEFLG
variable.comment: Y=Case, N=Control, N/A=Study was not a case/control design. Note that in some studies the same participant may act as both a case and a control (e.g. studies looking at multiple outcomes).
variable.value: No - Control
Not Applicable
Yes - Case
